TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Versioned extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The module contains procedures used to interact with objects, applications, and systems.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that run other programs, call a method or property, sound a beep from the computer, provide a command-line string, manipulate COM objects, and control dialog boxes.
This class is the Visual Basic 2005 updated version of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Interaction> class (which was used in Visual Basic 2003).

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CallByName (object Instance, string MethodName, Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType UseCallType, object[] Arguments);
.method public static object CallByName(object Instance, string MethodName, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType UseCallType, object[] Arguments) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. . A pointer to the object exposing the property or method.
Required. . A string expression containing the name of the property or method on the object.
Required. An enumeration member of type representing the type of procedure being called. The value of can be , , or .
Optional. . A parameter array containing the arguments to be passed to the property or method being called.
Docs.summary: Executes a method on an object, or sets or returns a property on an object.
Docs.returns: Executes a method on an object, or sets or returns a property on an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static bool IsNumeric(object Expression) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.
Docs.returns: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated as a number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string SystemTypeName(string VbName) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. A string variable containing a Visual Basic type name.
Docs.summary: Returns a string value containing the system data type name of a variable.
Docs.returns: Returns a string value containing the system data type name of a variable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string TypeName(object Expression) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. variable. If is , you can pass a variable of any data type except a structure.
Docs.summary: Returns a string value containing data type information about a variable.
Docs.returns: Returns a string value containing data type information about a variable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static string VbTypeName(string SystemName) cil managed

Docs.param: Required. String variable containing a type name used by the common language runtime.
Docs.summary: Returns a string value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.
Docs.returns: Returns a string value containing the Visual Basic data type name of a variable.
